title: PBE email not sending and username is forgotten
body: So I made a PBE account at the start of this year, and I haven't touched it since my internet was too slow to download the PBE. I've recently gotten better internet and have managed to download the PBE but I've forgotten my username and with the 'Forgot your Username?', I put the email I thought I used but got no email after 10 minutes. I tried to get a new PBE account but it said I already have one so I was wondering is there is a way to check what PBE account my real account is linked to.

replies.body:
Submit a ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They should be able to help you out.

All good I managed to guess my username and sending a email to the username's email worked. Not sure why just sending an email didn't work, but at least I have my account back. Thanks for the help anyway
